title: Blackbeard (Radio Edit)
description:
Greg Jenner is joined by comedian Stu Goldsmith and historian Dr Rebecca Simon for a hilarious look at the life of the infamous pirate, Blackbeard.

Produced by Dan Morelle
Scripted by Greg Jenner
Researched by Emma Nagouse
Radio edit by Cornelius Mendez

A Muddy Knees Media production for BBC Radio 4.
itunes:subtitle: Greg Jenner and his guests learn about the infamous pirate Blackbeard.
